creator: AppLife Team
descriptionHtml:
What is Glitch (Zalgo) Text?
You might have seen this corr̟̔u̦̓̈́ͅp̩̿͟͠ted kind of text used on social media, such as Facebook or Twitter. This kind of text is often referred to as "Zalgo", "glitch", or "corrupted" text, due to its unsettling appearance. Now you can generator your own cṟ̡̒̇ē̼̯̈́e̲̅p̨̨͆̚y ̬͚͠͠tẹ̬͑̓x̻̋t̕͜ right from your browser!

How to Use
You can create your own zalgo̬͉̓͞ ̟̈́tex̗͒ť̪ by easily by entering your text up top, and adjusting the options until you get the desi̬̒re̓͜d͎͔̋̐ ̦̏̕͟a̠͆m̡̥̓̈́oun͈̲̾̄t of̊͢ coṛ̬̈́r̡͞u̪͡ption. You can copy/paste the corrupted text into most websites. To make it easy, clicking the button will automatically copy the text for you!

DOWNLOAD NOW!
